name: Blucifer
description:
Anxiously I fly,
apocalyptic hell beast
fails to soothe my nerves.

All ye who enter Denver via airplane must meet the penetrating glowing scarlet gaze of "Blucifer", the 32 foot tall blue mustang that defiantly guards the gateway to the Rocky Mountains.

Some believe the fact that Blucifer killed its own creator while being sculpted is a sign that it is an evil, cursed herald of apocalypse, and part of a larger nefarious underground conspiracy. Others maintain it was just an unfortunate coincidence, and simply a lifeless sculpture.

But... what if it's true...?

Could it be? What if the blue mustang really is a vessel for ancient, unspeakable evil? What if Denver is intended as ground zero for the apocalypse?!

An extraordinary lightning storm awakens the Evil within Blucifer, freeing him to rampage through the Mile High city. Blucifer will destroy everything in his path, consuming the Souls of the Innocents along the way. How long will his trot of terror last?!

------

- Run Blucifer through the actual streets and neighborhoods of Denver, Colorado.
- Destroy city blocks to open portals to the Endless Void, granting Unholy Speed power to Blucifer!
- Burn famous landmarks and tourist sights to the ground!
- Avoid or crush any resistance that would foolishly attack you.
- Destroy as much as you can before your evil power runs out and Blucifer is banished to his captive statue form once again!
- A portion of all game sales is donated to DonorsChoose.org, directly benefiting school classrooms in Denver and around Colorado!

Blucifer: The Denver Doom Horse is a good luck, have fun game, lovingly crafted right here in Denver. If you've ever visited or lived in the Mile High City, you'll love this game's recreation of one of the world's best places to live.

#303Life #BluciferRun

------
